attributes.action: stop people from creating stupid petitions on a government website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a complete waste of time that people will dream up 'daft' petitions and then be given the ability to promote them on a government website. I urge it to be stopped immediately. I urge all non-serious petitions to be withdrawn from this website, including this petition - unless you think it is serious enough to stay.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
